snippet.title: Crumbling - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Embark on an adventure in Crumbling, an upcoming VR roguelike game where you control your character with one hand, just like playing with an action figure. Check out the trailer to see what to expect. Crumbling will be available on Steam VR and Meta Quest 2 in summer 2023.
